title: patch 5.12 rundown- I kind of respect Rito's approach
body:
I originally thought "ughhhh 14 minutes of rambling, gonna not be worth to watch"

I kind of liked how they addressed a lot of the concerns people had regarding ryze, fiddle/runeglaive, and the elise buffs. they even apologized  for Ryze and he broken chain CC. Also, the Elise buffs are very welcome, and I hope runeglaive is worthwhile.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=feCeOcI8GZ0&feature=youtu.be
